about_the_game:
History

In this world, there are floating islands, and they are almost entirely dependent on air transportation.
Kanahe was resting, when, suddenly, a zeppelin falls on his island,
destroying it and forcing him to leave there quickly in the same zeppelin, which mysteriously,
He barely continues to serve, so he flies through the skies, seeking to recover his peaceful life.

The game

It's about a zeppelin that shoots arrows and destroys enemies (like a Martian killer) but in this case,
you need to think well about the shot, since you must calculate the power of the arrow,
since it varies depending on the gravity and the distance at which your enemy is.
You can acquire upgrades, skins and extra powers for your adventure.

Game features

Overcome linear levels full of enemies like horizontal 2D ship games but with the mechanics of shooting arrows, you have a variety of skills and powers for more fun or difficulty

⭐Travel through the incredible free level selector with secrets and surprises.

⭐It is not necessary to go alone, you can play with someone else in the adventure!

⭐Acquire skills and powers.

⭐Meet characters and collect wacky enemy cards.

⭐Face bosses that impede your path.

⭐Experience the story of Kanahe, and find out what happened in this world so different from what you know.

⭐Move your Zeppelin to the rhythm of the soundtrack, which nostalgically reminds you of your lost home.

⭐Mainly created by a single person.

History

In this world, there are floating islands, and they are almost entirely dependent on air transportation.
Kanahe was resting, when, suddenly, a zeppelin falls on his island,
destroying it and forcing him to leave there quickly in the same zeppelin, which mysteriously,
He barely continues to serve, so he flies through the skies, seeking to recover his peaceful life.

The game

It's about a zeppelin that shoots arrows and destroys enemies (like a Martian killer) but in this case,
you need to think well about the shot, since you must calculate the power of the arrow,
since it varies depending on the gravity and the distance at which your enemy is.
You can acquire upgrades, skins and extra powers for your adventure.

Game features

⭐Travel through the incredible free level selector with secrets and surprises.

name: Spacewind The Zeppelin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 280 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 280 MB available space

short_description: A Zeppelin that shoots arrows where you can acquire improved skins and powers for your adventure
supported_languages: Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain, English
